sanapuuro.sanapuuro.letters

Class LetterPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • sanapuuro.sanapuuro.letters.LetterPool

  • public class LetterPool
extends Object
    Letter pool where all the letters a player can place to a letter grid are kept.
    Author:
    skaipio

      For checking whether a letter container at the given index is already in the grid.

        public boolean isIndexUsed(int i)
        For checking whether a letter container at the given index is already in the grid.
        Parameters:
        i - Index of the letter container.
        Returns:
        True if the letter container is in use, false otherwise.
